signature: RTree<T, S> read(InputStream, long, InternalStructure) throws IOException

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods handle reading data from an InputStream, making readFully a suitable setup method for read.

enhanced_by.method_name: toNodeDefault(Node_, Context<T, S>, Func1<byte[], ? extends T>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve converting data structures from one form to another, specifically from Node_ to Node<T, S>.
createEntries is used to process and convert entries from Node_ to a list of Entry<T, S>, which is a necessary step after reading the input stream.
toGeometry converts Geometry_ objects to Geometry, which is a necessary step in processing the read data.
